Name: 与雾雨魔理沙一起偷重要的东西 ~ Happy Stealing with Kirisame Marisa
About the game: “Welcome to Koumakan, Marisa. Hope you don't come here to steal stuff……” ·Play as Kirisame Marisa, steal stuff with the joyful melodies. ·Some shoujo are not happy with your action, try not to get caught by them or you will see…… ·Find all the item that can help you get through this, use them sparely though ·After stealing all the things you need, exit out of there safely! Will you successful steal all the things and leave without any worry? Or you will get caught and face some thing you don't want to face? All in《Happy Stealing with Kirisame Marisa》 Caution：《Happy Stealing with Kirisame Marisa》 is a Touhou fan-made horror game powered by Unreal4, Children under the age of 10 are invited to play with their parents Made by Bawu Team Origin by ©Team Shanghai Alice/Zun Thanks to Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning This game follows the Touhou Project Steam Publishing Statute
